Tenta angāri Jūsu saimniecībai vai uzņēm: Tent hangars for your farm or business!
Ar desmit gadu pieredzi tenta angāru noz: With ten years of experience in the tent hangar industry, we offer top-quality solutions that have been tested in various conditions and are suitable for a wide range of needs.
Nodrošinām ātru piegādi un ātru piekļuvi: We ensure fast delivery and quick access to our products thanks to extensive stock always available at our warehouse.
Piedāvājam 100% servisu, kas ietver ne t: We offer 100% service, including professional consultations before purchase, comprehensive support, and assistance after purchase to ensure your complete satisfaction.
Visām mūsu precēm ir pieejamas detalizēt: All our products come with detailed online installation instructions to simplify the installation process and ensure clarity.
Mūsu angāri ir viegli un ātri uzstādāmi,: Our hangars are easy and quick to install, whether done by us or yourself. The products are designed to be installable in any climatic conditions, ensuring high functionality and durability.
Kāpēc izvēlēties STOREX angāra iegādei?: Why choose STOREX for hangar purchase?
Vieglās konstrukcijas tenta angāri, vieg: Lightweight tent hangars, easy to assemble, from 55 to 465 m².
Platība no 36 m2. Konteineru tenta angār: Area from 36 m². Container tent hangars are suitable for standard containers with a height of 2.6 m.
Platība 170 - 215 m2. Industriālās siltu: Area 170 - 215 m². Industrial greenhouses for professionals and beginners.
Remkomplekts angāra tentam, metāla vārti: Repair kit for hangar tent, metal gates as an additional option
Mums ir vairāk nekā 10 gadu pieredze dar: We have over 10 years of experience working with tent hangars. More than 1,000 companies and individuals have become our clients not only in Latvia but also in European countries. We offer high-quality tent hangars manufactured according to the highest quality standards EN 1090-1:2009+A1:2011 and meeting all EU requirements. The hangars have CE certificates suitable for receiving EU support.
Mēs piedāvājam ne tikai augstākās kvalit: We not only offer the highest quality hangars but also excellent customer service. You will be fully satisfied with your purchase, and if you have any questions or need assistance, our experienced specialists are always available for free consultations.
Mūsu prioritāte ir apmierināts klients,: Our priority is a satisfied customer who receives exactly what they need—a quality solution that fully meets their needs.
Kāda garantija ir Jūsu produkcijai?: What is the warranty on your products?
Vai iespējams salabot tenta angāru?: Is it possible to repair a tent hangar?
Kāds ir tenta kalpošanas laiks?: What is the lifespan of the tent?
No kāda materiāla ir taisīts angāra rāmi: What material is the hangar frame made of?
Angāra rāmis ir veidots no cinkotas metā: The hangar frame is made of galvanized metal tubes (diameter is 60 cm).
Vai vajag nostiprināt angāru pie zemes?: Does the hangar need to be anchored to the ground?
Kāds ir augstums angāru sāna malai?: What is the height of the side wall of the hangar?
Vai ir iespējams savienot divus angārus: Is it possible to connect two hangars together?
Vai ir iespējams nosiltināt tikai angāru: Is it possible to insulate only the hangar?
Vai ir iespējams iemontēt citus vārtus t: Is it possible to install other gates in the tent hangars?
Vai ir iespējams iemontēt papildus mazās: Is it possible to install additional small doors?
